title: Connect MNG - Where Your Journey is Our Journey
content: This blog is more than just a virtual space; it's a cozy coerner where we can come together as Mongolian American college + students and young professionals, share our stories, and support each other on this incredible journey...

title: All the basics you need to know about resume
content: As the first impression is always important, your resume is the first impression you can make at the companies when appying for a job. According to the Ladders study, on average, recruiters spend 7.4 seconds on the initial screeming of a resume...
